column5: Ok guys if your planing to do some crappie fishing in my Marina ...its not going to happen for a awhile now do to it being frooze over ....still a little Open water on the main river but is freezen up as we speak ...won't be long we will be Ice fishing Crappies and Walleye on the Lower Grand River Dunnville if this weather keeps up ...
So...goin out on a limb here.....your launch is closed? Dang! Here's to a good hardwater season!
For now yes unless we get warm weather to melt the ice ..i would rather see guys walking down the ramp with there ice huts anyways ...
Nope -- the warm weather had it's chance...it's over!  Let us know when we can walk on that ice!!!!
Can't wait myself for good ice ....
